docs.snippet: After bragging that he had unified Republicans in one of the most “love-filled” conventions in history, the nominee went on an extended diatribe against his primary rival....
docs.lead_paragraph: After bragging that he had unified Republicans in one of the most “love-filled” conventions in history, the nominee went on an extended diatribe against his primary rival.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump delivers extended criticism of Sen Ted Cruz day after Republican National Convention wraps up, preceding his remarks about Cruz with declaration that party is unified; says he would not accept Cruz's endorsement even if it is offered.

headline.main: Donald Trump Basks in Convention ‘Love’ (but Has None for Ted Cruz)
headline.print_headline: Victory Lap for Trump,  Complete With Ax to Grind

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Kaine, a former governor of Virginia who is now on the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, speaks fluent Spanish and has a strong friendship with Mrs. Clinton.
docs.abstract: Democratic presidential contender Hillary Rodham Clinton picks Sen Tim Kaine of Virginia to be her running mate; Kaine has working-class roots and is fluent in Spanish, traits that Clinton believes can bolster her chances to defeat Donald J Trump in general election.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Selects Tim Kaine, a Popular Senator From a Swing State, as Running Mate
headline.print_headline: Clinton Names a Senator as Vice-Presidential Pick

docs.snippet: Mr. Kaine is a senator and former governor from Virginia, a crucial swing state, but his credentials as a moderate might not satisfy the Democratic Party’s base....

headline.main: Who Is Tim Kaine? Virginia Senator Is Hillary Clinton’s Running Mate

docs.snippet: The Virginia politician’s value is almost entirely about governing — it’s less about his ballot box impact than about what he’ll bring to the White House....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Virginia politician’s value is almost entirely about governing — it’s less about his ballot box impact than about what he’ll bring to the White House.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; Hillary Clinton's selection of Sen Tim Kaine as her running mate underscores her confidence in outcome of presidential election, given that Kaine's value lies almost entirely in aiding Clinton once they are both in White House.

headline.main: With Pick, Hillary Clinton Signals She’s Looking Past Inauguration Day
headline.print_headline: With Running Mate, Clinton Looks Beyond Inauguration Day

docs.snippet: Some of the nearly 20,000 messages, made public through WikiLeaks, show officials at the Democratic National Committee thought little of Mr. Sanders’ chances of becoming president....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of the nearly 20,000 messages, made public through WikiLeaks, show officials at the Democratic National Committee thought little of Mr. Sanders’ chances of becoming president.
docs.abstract: Emails sent by top Democratic National Committee officials, posted by WikiLeaks, reveal rampant criticism and mockery of Sen Bernie Sanders's presidential campaign; emails reveal messages that suggest chairwoman Rep Debbie Wasserman Schultz and others heavily favored Hillary Clinton over Sanders.

headline.main: Released Emails Suggest the D.N.C. Derided the Sanders Campaign
headline.print_headline: Emails Suggest That Democratic Officials Scoffed at Sanders’s Campaign
